original: @175a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs pha rol rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @175a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs pha rol rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the conqueror of the far shore.

original: glang chen lpags bsnams bcu drug phyed phyed gdong pa can //
analyzed: glang chen lpags bsnams bcu drug phyed phyed gdong pa can //
translated: Wearing an elephant skin, with faces of half-moon shape,

original: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo mda' thogs de bzhin g-yon //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo mda' thogs de bzhin g-yon //
translated: holding a vajra, sword, discus, and arrow in the right hands,

original: dril bu sdigs mdzub kha tv'am gzhu 'dzin rngam pa'i sku //
analyzed: dril bu sdigs mdzub kha tv'am gzhu 'dzin rngam pa'i sku //
translated: and a bell, threatening forefinger, khaṭvāṅga, and bow in the left hands, with a wrathful body,🔽may the great fierce one with eight feet, trampling on the heads of the eight obstructors, be victorious.

original: gtum chen zhabs brgyad bgegs brgyad mgo mnan rgyal gyur cig /'jig rten thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gtum chen zhabs brgyad bgegs brgyad mgo mnan rgyal gyur cig /'jig rten thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of protecting all worlds,

original: pha rol rnam gnon mthing ga drag / gdug pa kun gyis sku brgyan pa //
analyzed: pha rol rnam gnon mthing ga drag / gdug pa kun gyis sku brgyan pa //
translated: the dark blue conqueror of the far shore, adorned with all the ornaments of a wrathful one,

original: me dpung rab 'bar dpa' bo bsgoms //
analyzed: me dpung rab 'bar dpa' bo bsgoms //
translated: is meditated upon as a hero with a blazing bonfire.

original: snying rje khros pas sku bsgyur la //
analyzed: snying rje khros pas sku bsgyur la //
translated: With compassion and wrath, he transforms his body,

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas cod pan 'chang //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas cod pan 'chang //
translated: wearing a crown of the buddhas of the three times.

original: rus pa'i gdugs phub 'brug sgra sgrogs //
analyzed: rus pa'i gdugs phub 'brug sgra sgrogs //
translated: He holds a bone parasol and roars like thunder.

original: 'khor gnyis kyis ni las byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor gnyis kyis ni las byed pa'o //
translated: The two retinues perform the activities.

original: aom a'a:hr'i:ma h'a k'a ru ni ka tsanda ma h'a ro sha ni bha ya ha ra ne raksha ba ra nam gub ti pa re bi dze sv'a h'a /🔽gcan gzan drag po rnams kyi mche ba dang sder mo'i rtse mo la ni rgod dang rgyal po'i khrag gam son mo'i chus byugs la rig pa brgya bzlas la dpung par bcing ngo //🔽'jigs skyob khro bo drag shul che //🔽mdun nas 'gro zhing chom rkun gsod //
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:ma h'a k'a ru ni ka tsanda ma h'a ro sha ni bha ya ha ra ne raksha ba ra nam gub ti pa re bi dze sv'a h'a / gcan gzan drag po rnams kyi mche ba dang sder mo'i rtse mo la ni rgod dang rgyal po'i khrag gam son mo'i chus byugs la rig pa brgya bzlas la dpung par bcing ngo // 'jigs skyob khro bo drag shul che // mdun nas 'gro zhing chom rkun gsod //
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ | O great compassionate one, Caṇḍamahāroṣaṇa, protect me, protect me, protect my body, speech, and mind, and grant me the supreme accomplishment! Svāhā!🔽 On the tips of the fangs and claws of fierce beasts, smear the blood of a vulture or a king, or the water of a son's urine, and recite the vidyā one hundred times. Bind it on the arm.🔽 The protector from fear, the fierce and powerful one,🔽 goes in front and kills the robbers.🔽🔽

original: dga' byed drag po phag khrid pa //🔽phyi bzhin rjes 'brang mi 'jigs sbyin //🔽ji srid ya nga'i lam bskyab nas //🔽spyod yul phyin par gyur pa na //🔽gnyis 'dus mgon po rgyan med zhi //🔽sku gzugs rnam pas mchod pas mnyes //🔽sna tshogs 'jigs pas yang nyam thag dang // gang yang pha rol dregs pas btul byas nas //
analyzed: dga' byed drag po phag khrid pa //🔽phyi bzhin rjes 'brang mi 'jigs sbyin //🔽ji srid ya nga'i lam bskyab nas //🔽spyod yul phyin par gyur pa na //🔽gnyis 'dus mgon po rgyan med zhi //🔽sku gzugs rnam pas mchod pas mnyes //🔽sna tshogs 'jigs pas yang nyam thag dang // gang yang pha rol dregs pas btul byas nas //

original: go 'phang mchog 'dir dngos grub sbyin 'dod pa //
analyzed: go 'phang mchog 'dir dngos grub sbyin 'dod pa //
translated: And who wishes to bestow the highest rank and power,

original: rgyal ras bzang la @175b grogs mchog 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal ras bzang la @175b grogs mchog 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the best friend for the good cloth of the king.

original: khro dang nga rgyal mang ba dang // sred pas zang zing don gnyer ba //
analyzed: khro dang nga rgyal mang ba dang // sred pas zang zing don gnyer ba //
translated: Those who are angry and proud, and who seek material things out of craving,

original: da ni gus par gyur na yang //
analyzed: da ni gus par gyur na yang //
translated: Now, even if they become respectful,

original: cho ga 'di las ring bar byed //
analyzed: cho ga 'di las ring bar byed //
translated: they will be far from this rite.

original: chom rkun bcing ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: chom rkun bcing ba rdzogs so//
translated: The binding of the thief is complete.
